description:
Comfort meets performance, with features that add a little ease to your workout. Moisture-wicking recycled nylon with a high waist keeps you covered during vinyasas or deadlifts.

  • NetPlus® nylon blend is made from recycled fishing nets and wicks moisture to keep you dry and comfortable
  • Fabric is treated with miDori™ bioSoft for added wicking and softness
  • HeiQ® Fresh durable odour control resists smells
  • High-rise, wide elastic waistband adds coverage
  • Flatlock seams throughout eliminate chafing
name: Patagonia Maipo 7/8 Tights - Women's
